page.title: 16Clubs and Social Activities
page.content: The{Women's Institute}meets once a month in the Village Hall. There are 59 members aged 19 to 70+ who come to hear visiting speakers on a wide range of subjects from"Hair Care" to "Medical Murders" S Holbrow {The Cricket Club,}established in 1920 now has 39 playing members. Friendly fixtures are played on Saturdays and Sundays against local village sides and another team participates in a Dunstable mid-week League. R Bender There is a {Keep Fit Group }which meets weekly and enters the Bedfordshire County Keep Fit Demonstration every year. E Bull {National Childbirth Trust An association which ensures that essential and practical help is available to expectant and new parents. A nationwide organisation
